OOC: Jeff just kicks ass. He can't say a wrong!...

  ----- Original Messag=
e ----- 
  From: rAuq 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, July 1=
6, 2001 1:32 AM
  Subject: Re: Clash


  Two bots combined shouldn't form a=
 45 foot tall gestalt, what were 
  you thinking? While I'm at it, LN, can =
you please send the council 
  explainations for all of your weapons on you=
r bots. We discussed 
  your ships, but your bots may be pushing our power =
limits. 

  Also, can you please try to keep your posts reasonable, words l=
ike 
  "massive" (and especially when combined with "powerful") make 
  you=
r bots sound generally much more powerful than the other bots. 
  You may n=
ot think so but you aren't the one reading the post and 
  the one making t=
he decision of how to respond. 

  Your post with Gemini Dragon where he ki=
cked Train Wreck was a 
  mode, you posted for the kick hitting (which is i=
llegal). You've got 
  to make an attempt when you attack.

  Orchid (and b=
tw no need yell MODE k? =3D) was right in the sense 
  that all of the bots=
 coming and helping the Chivitrons was cheap, 
  but it is incorrect to say=
 that the Chivitrons themselves are cheap, 
  that would be a false stereot=
ype of the group as a whole. The 
  Chivitrons are made up of many bots, no=
t just one cheap one. =3DP


  On 15 Jul 2001, at 2:00, Legendarynemasis@ao=
l.com wrote:

  > Gestalts are allowed to be much bigger, Yan said 50 feet =
was the
  > maximum and Gemini Dragon is 45 feet tall. its Gemini 1 and 2
 =
 > combined.

hoo.com/info/terms/
